nodes.text: Roon Tours was a travel agency that offered short vacations on the desert planet Tatooine for wealthy, jaded tourists who were seeking unusual thrills. One of their passenger ships was docked in the spaceport of Mos Eisley on Tatooine at the time that the YT-1300 light freighter known as the Millennium Falcon fled the port in order to escape the Galactic Empire shortly before the Battle of Yavin. The company shared its name with the planet Roon.

Roon Tours was first mentioned in Inside the Worlds of Star Wars Trilogy, a Star Wars Legends reference book written by James Luceno and released in 2004. The company was made canon by a reprint of the map featuring the information about Roon Tours in the edition of Star Wars: Complete Locations released in 2016.
